languages.text: "Значит, приглашение друкари оказалось ловушкой. Видят звезды, вы, друкари, такие предсказуемые!"
"So the invitation was a trap after all. By the stars, you Drukhari are so predictable!"
languages.original_text: "Значит, приглашение друкари оказалось ловушкой. Видят звезды, вы, друкари, такие предсказуемые!"

traits.locale_text: "So the invitation was a trap after all. By the stars, you Drukhari are so predictable!"
"So the invitation was a trap after all. By the stars, you Drukhari are so predictable!"
"So the invitation was a trap after all. By the stars, you Drukhari are so predictable!"
"So the invitation was a trap after all. By the stars, you Drukhari are so predictable!"
"So the invitation was a trap after all. By the stars, you Drukhari are so predictable!"

languages.text: "Die Einladung war also doch eine Falle. Bei den Sternen, Ihr Drukhari seid so berechenbar!"
languages.original_text: "So the invitation was a trap after all. By the stars, you Drukhari are so predictable!"

traits.locale_text: "Die Einladung war also doch eine Falle. Bei den Sternen, Ihr Drukhari seid so berechenbar!"

languages.text: “看来，这场邀请终究是个陷阱。群星在上，你们黑暗灵族的心思简直是太好猜了！”
languages.original_text: "So the invitation was a trap after all. By the stars, you Drukhari are so predictable!"

traits.locale_text: “看来，这场邀请终究是个陷阱。群星在上，你们黑暗灵族的心思简直是太好猜了！”

languages.text: « L'invitation cachait donc bien un piège. Par les étoiles, vous autres Drukharis êtes si prévisibles ! »
languages.original_text: "So the invitation was a trap after all. By the stars, you Drukhari are so predictable!"

traits.locale_text: « L'invitation cachait donc bien un piège. Par les étoiles, vous autres Drukhari êtes si prévisibles ! »

languages.text: «Así que la invitación era una trampa después de todo. ¡Mira que sois predecibles los Drukhari!».
languages.original_text: "So the invitation was a trap after all. By the stars, you Drukhari are so predictable!"

traits.locale_text: «Así que la invitación era una trampa después de todo. ¡Mira que sois predecibles los Drukhari!».

languages.text: 「つまり結局のところ、招待は罠だったわけか。お前たちデュカーリはどれだけ単純なのか！」
languages.original_text: "So the invitation was a trap after all. By the stars, you Drukhari are so predictable!"

traits.locale_text: 「つまり結局のところ、招待は罠だったわけか。お前たちデュカーリはどれだけ単純なのか！」

languages.text: "Davet, beklendiği üzere tuzak çıktı. Yıldızlar adına, siz Drukhariler amma ön görülebilirsiniz!"
languages.original_text: "So the invitation was a trap after all. By the stars, you Drukhari are so predictable!"

traits.locale_text: "Demek beklendiği üzere bu davet bir tuzaktı. Yıldızlar adına, siz Drukhariler çok ön görülebilirsiniz!"
